short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catch the requests and return response from other urls or local files, block ads, inject request headers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lightweight alternative for auto responder in fiddler. 
Use this extension to return a mocked custom response or to return a response from another backend address to a deployed client.
